description.p: Get the current date (according to the SQL database server).
Returns the current date from the SQL database server.

discussion.p: The CurrentDate function gets the current date from the SQL database server.

example.caption: CurrentDate() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDate() AS Now FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:00:00 00 am
